title: A vvomans birth, or A perfect relation more witty then common set forth to declare the descent of a woman. To a pleasant new tune.
author: [Philo-Balladus].
publisher: for Francis Grove, dwelling upon Snow-hill,
notes: Verse - "There is a certaine kind of sole creature,".
Attributed to Philo-Balladus (a pseudonym) by STC.
In two parts; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproductions of the original in the British Library.
